data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roig-Junent, Sergio, Rouaux, Julia (2012): A new species of Rhytidognathus (Carabidae, Migadopini) from Argentina. ZooKeys 247: 45-60, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.247.3303, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.247.3303
